name: 2019 Kyoto ACEAT Annual Conference on Engineering and Applied Science
content: Annual Conference on Engineering and Applied Science (ACEAT) will be held from December 17-19, 2019 in Kyoto, Japan. The purpose of the conference is to bring together international scholars, researchers, practitioners and PhD students in the field of Engineering and Applied Science to develop their understandings of both theories and practice, providing opportunities for further professional development for fellows and students in this field. The ACEAT 2019 program will include oral, poster sessions and feature a mix of international speakers for the Keynote Address. All the accepted research paper/ abstracts will be eligible to be presented at the conference.
